121840001.text: Hello {NICKNAME}, I'm Guangjin, a Realm-Keeping Commission orderly for the Scalegorge Waterscape delve

121840002.text: I've heard a lot about you from the Exalting Sanctum's Realm-Keeping Commission and got your contact details from them

121840003.text: You want me for something again?

121840004.text: ...Yes. Looks like you've got plenty of experience of this and saw this coming.

121840005.text: Why is the Realm-Keeping Commission after me? Am I in trouble?

121840006.text: Don't worry. I just have something for you

121840007.text: Recently we got reports that some civilians have entered an unknown area and encountered monsters that can become invisible

121840008.text: I know the cloudhymn magic of the Vidyadhara can conceal their form. That's not it, right?

121840009.text: I didn't think you'd be so familiar with the Vidyadhara cloudhymn magic. That makes it much easier for me to explain what's going on

121840010.text: I'm a Vidyadhara myself. What's happening here is similar to cloudhymn magic, but not completely identical

121840011.text: It's hard to explain everything over text. Let's meet face-to-face

121840012.text: Come whenever you have the time. I'll be at the Healer's Market in the Alchemy Commission
